data.text:
@FrankLopezGhost @sickofitall2222 @MythinformedMKE And the erros is just by a small MARGIN OF HISTORICALLY. No big deal it is not like they were forcing it down on people's throats, harassing and threatening them about losing their jobs. Just an opsie...

Who cares if it violated the nuremberg code...
@sickofitall2222 @MythinformedMKE They claim Acetaminophen is safe too, it’s the leading cause of acute liver failure, all drugs & vaccines have side effects & risks.
@FrankLopezGhost @MythinformedMKE Except these were touted as safe and effective and are neither. A Bill going through Parliament and jobs being advertised in the NHS to deal with claims.
@sickofitall2222 @MythinformedMKE All vaccines have side effects & risks, as do most drugs, Brian is not breaking new ground here.
@MythinformedMKE I am shocked this post hasn't been flagged as "misleading" yet by the Twitter ministry of truth.
@MythinformedMKE Brian, you do know there’s been a vaccine compensation fund set up since 1988 for all kinds of vaccines, including the flu shot. It’s called the VICP
